name: Sketchy Survival
description:
Welcome to Sketchy Survival, the wacky 2D video game about surviving 30 days in a world filled with monsters!

In this game, you play as a cartoon character who finds himself in a strange and dangerous world. The only way to survive is to find food and keep your health up while avoiding the monsters that spawn in through a portal at the edge of the  randomly generated map.

As you explore the world, you'll encounter all kinds of bizarre creatures, from giant spiders to evil buzzards, and you'll need to use your sketchy skills to fend them off.

Beware; not all food is good to eat. Some items might give you a temporary boost but leave you feeling hungry, while others might have unexpected effects.

As you progress through the game, the monsters will get more numerous, and you'll need to use your quick reflexes and strategic thinking to survive.

Sketchy Survival is a hilarious and addictive game that will keep you entertained for hours. So get ready to thrive, fight, and survive in this wacky world filled with monsters and surprises!
